author: SomeOrdinaryGamers
description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time I share a problem I've been having with PC gaming for quite a while as I'm sure a lot of you have also been when dealing with new games on the PC. Despite a rising player count, plenty of developers still feel like shafting hard paying users with broken, buggy releases. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: Why is PC Gaming So Unoptimized and Broken...
